s.text: Not that he has to around Theresa, who traces him through his stationery and shows up pretending that she's interested in boats.

Confidential (1997) and gave Gibson one of his wildest roles ever in his script for Conspiracy Theory (1997)--which the actor hit out of the park, striking a note of authentic paranoia that put him leagues ahead of most action stars.

In more or less linear fashion, it tells the story of a violent thief, Porter (Mel Gibson), who, left for dead after a double-cross, re-emerges with an implacable determination to avenge himself on his ex-partner, Val (Gregg Henry), and reclaim some $70,000 that is rightfully his--rightfully in the sense that he's the one who actually stole it.
? If Message in a Bottle is finally about holding onto what's most dear before it's too late, shouldn't we be chucking Costner into the briny and clinging to Newman?

(1997) and gave Gibson one of his wildest roles ever in his script for Conspiracy Theory (1997)--which the actor hit out of the park, striking a note of authentic paranoia that put him leagues ahead of most action stars.
It's probably just as well for the film's commercial prospects that the director, Luis Mandoki ( When a Man Loves a Woman ), does not appear to have a mind with multiple tracks.
